content.question: Which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the square root of x, end root, times, open parenthesis, 9 times x cubed, minus 2 times the square root of x, end root, plus the fraction 8 over x, end fraction, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the square root of x, end root, d x, times, the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, 9 times x cubed, minus 2 times the square root of x, end root, plus the fraction 8 over x, end fraction, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>⋅</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, 9 times x raised to the seven halves power, minus 2 x, plus 8 times x raised to the negative one half power, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, 9 times u to the sixth power, minus 2 u, plus 8 times u to the negative 2 power, close parenthesis, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="u equals the square root of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the square root of x, times the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, 9 times u to the seventh power, minus 2 times u squared, plus 8 times u to the negative 1 power, close parenthesis, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="u equals the square root of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, open parenthesis, 9 times x raised to the seven halves power, minus 2 x, plus 8 times x raised to the negative one half power, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the classification of a given expression (e.g., Use the chain rule to find the derivative of a composite function).
